A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: My only conclusion is that Rian Johnson has neither seen nor holds affection for Star Wars. In the same way that JJ Abrams decided he knew Star Trek better than anyone else\, Johnson has decided that Star Wars needs less well rounded characters and more plot points masquerading as characters. Worse than Into Darkness\, if a lot prettier. Hopefully Episode 9 will be better\, but I have little hope. This movie did not ignite a spark.
